group_1.textRight: This is the story of a girl who’s not just smart, @but also strong and resilient.
No wonder you modelled her after Ai-san.

group_1.textLeft: That’s part of it… but there was another reason…

group_1.textRight: Ah, I know! Because you like Ai-san?

group_1.textLeft: ...Fufu, you might be right, in a way…

group_1.textRight: Oh, really?

group_1.textLeft: Not long ago,
we heard that if Nemu-chan’s gone, her [textBlue:Rumors] @would also disappear, right…?

group_1.textRight: Yeah…

group_1.textLeft: Sorry, I shouldn’t be thinking about those sorts of things...
But if Nemu-chan were to disappear, then so would Ai-chan...
That’s why, I wanted to leave behind
a story about Ai-chan, in any shape or form...

group_1.textRight: Is there nothing else remaining that’d show @Ai-chan was here…?

group_1.textLeft: The Radio Girl rumor that Ai-chan’s [textBlue:Rumor] was @based on remains,
but nothing that I could say exists together with me @in the physical world...
I only have my memories…

group_1.textRight: So that’s how it is...

group_1.textLeft: Therefore, if I make Ai-chan my picture book’s protagonist,
I thought that could leave behind a sign of her existence.

group_1.textRight: If Ai-san heard this, she’d definitely be pleased.

group_1.textLeft: I’m not so sure… I’m just selfishly doing @what I want…
Ai-chan might get annoyed with me…

group_1.textRight: Sana-san, you’ve put so much thought into this.
She definitely wouldn’t be annoyed by you.

group_1.textLeft: ...[wait:0.8][chara:100401:cheek_0][chara:100401:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:100401:lipSynch_1]Okay.
I hope… that’s the case...

group_1.textRight: Sana-san, about Ai-san’s-
No, I mean Aoi-chan’s story, won’t you think about it some more?

group_1.textLeft: Yes…!

group_1.textRight: So will Aoi-chan stay in the “Land of Blessings” @for now?

group_1.textLeft: Mmm… That could happen, but…
I have a feeling Aoi-chan would want to travel @to more unknown lands
and make many more friends…

group_1.textRight: Then it seems you could make this a story about traveling to a variety of lands.

group_1.textLeft: Mhm…!

group_1.textRight: Aoi-chan’s smart, so maybe she’d go to the @“Land of Learning”!

group_1.textLeft: What kind of land is that?

group_1.textRight: It’s a place with nothing but schools!

group_1.textLeft: Fufu…
Imagining Aoi-chan in school feels pretty strange.

group_1.textRight: Where does Sana-san want Aoi-chan to go?

group_1.textLeft: For me… maybe the “Land of the Moon”.

group_1.textRight: What sort of place is that?

group_1.textLeft: Well it’s…
Mikazuki Villa, the Crescent Moon Villa…!

group_1.textRight: Ah… So that’s why it’s the “Land of the Moon”!

group_1.textLeft: Yeah…
A place where there are always kind people, @that warms your heart...

group_1.textRight: Then will she be able to get along with its residents, @us?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, no problem…!

group_1.textRight: Ah, Onee-chan and them are home.
